8 bool Utils::getNormals(PointCloudRGB::Ptr &cloud,
9  double normal_radius,
10  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>::Ptr &normals)
11 {
12  ROS_INFO("Computing normals with radius: %f", normal_radius);
13  pcl::NormalEstimation<pcl::PointXYZRGB, pcl::Normal> ne;
14  ne.setInputCloud(cloud);
15 
16  pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr tree(new pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZRGB>());
17  ne.setSearchMethod(tree);
18 
19  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>::Ptr cloud_normals(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>);
20  ne.setRadiusSearch(normal_radius);
21  ne.compute(*normals);
22 
23  // As we compute normal for each point in cloud, must have same size
24  bool success = normals->points.size() == cloud->points.size() ? true : false;
25 
26  return success;
27 }

32  {
33  return false;

47 bool Utils::isValidCloudMsg(const sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 &cloud_msg)
48 {
49  // int len = sizeof(cloud_msg.data)/sizeof(cloud_msg.data[0]); // not working
50  int len = cloud_msg.row_step * cloud_msg.height;
51  if (len == 0)
52  {
53  return false;
54  }
55  return true;
56 }

58 void Utils::colorizeCloud(PointCloudRGB::Ptr cloud_rgb,
59  int R, int G, int B)
60 {
61  for (size_t i = 0; i < cloud_rgb->points.size(); i++)
62  {
63  cloud_rgb->points[i].r = R;
64  cloud_rgb->points[i].g = G;
65  cloud_rgb->points[i].b = B;
66  }
67 }

69 void Utils::cloudToXYZRGB(PointCloudXYZ::Ptr cloud,
70  PointCloudRGB::Ptr cloud_rgb,
71  int R, int G, int B)
72 {
73  pcl::copyPointCloud(*cloud, *cloud_rgb);
74  colorizeCloud(cloud_rgb, R,G,B);
75 }

77 void Utils::cloudToROSMsg(PointCloudRGB::Ptr cloud,
78  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 &cloud_msg)
79 {
80  pcl::toROSMsg(*cloud, cloud_msg);
81  cloud_msg.header.frame_id = _frame_id;
82  cloud_msg.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
83 }
84 
85 double Utils::computeCloudResolution(PointCloudXYZ::Ptr cloud)
86 {
87  double res = 0.0;
88  int n_points = 0;
89  int nres;
90  std::vector<int> indices(2);
91  std::vector<float> sqr_distances(2);
92  pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZ> tree;
93  tree.setInputCloud(cloud);
94 
95  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < cloud->size(); ++i)
96  {
97  if (!std::isfinite((*cloud)[i].x))
98  {
99  continue;
100  }
101  //Considering the second neighbor since the first is the point itself.
102  nres = tree.nearestKSearch(i, 2, indices, sqr_distances);
103  if (nres == 2)
104  {
105  res += sqrt(sqr_distances[1]);
106  ++n_points;
107  }
108  }
109  if (n_points != 0)
110  {
111  res /= n_points;
112  }
113  return res;
114 }
115 
116 double Utils::computeCloudResolution(PointCloudRGB::Ptr cloud)
117 {
118  double res = 0.0;
119  int n_points = 0;
120  int nres;
121  std::vector<int> indices(2);
122  std::vector<float> sqr_distances(2);
123  pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZRGB> tree;
124  tree.setInputCloud(cloud);
125 
126  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < cloud->size(); ++i)
127  {
128  if (!std::isfinite((*cloud)[i].x))
129  {
130  continue;
131  }
132  //Considering the second neighbor since the first is the point itself.
133  nres = tree.nearestKSearch(i, 2, indices, sqr_distances);
134  if (nres == 2)
135  {
136  res += sqrt(sqr_distances[1]);
137  ++n_points;
138  }
139  }
140  if (n_points != 0)
141  {
142  res /= n_points;
143  }
144  return res;
145 }

147 void Utils::printTransform(const Eigen::Matrix4f &transform)
148 {
149  Eigen::IOFormat CleanFmt(4, 0, ", ", "\n", "\t\t\t\t[", "]");
150  std::cout << transform.format(CleanFmt) << std::endl;

153 void Utils::indicesFilter(PointCloudRGB::Ptr cloud_in,
154  PointCloudRGB::Ptr cloud_out,
155  boost::shared_ptr<std::vector<int> > indices)
156 {
157  pcl::ExtractIndices<pcl::PointXYZRGB> extract_indices_filter;
158  extract_indices_filter.setInputCloud(cloud_in);
159  extract_indices_filter.setIndices(indices);
160  extract_indices_filter.filter(*cloud_out);
161 }
162 
163 void Utils::displaceCloud(PointCloudRGB::Ptr cloud_in,
164  PointCloudRGB::Ptr cloud_out,
165  double x_offset,
166  double y_offset,
167  double z_offset)
168 {
169  pcl::copyPointCloud(*cloud_in, *cloud_out);
170  for (size_t i = 0; i < cloud_out->points.size(); i++)
171  {
172  cloud_out->points[i].x += x_offset;
173  cloud_out->points[i].y += y_offset;
174  cloud_out->points[i].z += z_offset;
175  }
176 }
